comments.body:
I noticed that we are mssing a call to `treeColor`

![48970828-64242200-f011-11e8-9b9b-08fd456e38eb](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3648029/49153799-09dbd780-f317-11e8-9711-a6a46eae1ac0.png)

Ah yes, I see it https://github.com/lampepfl/dotty/blob/53d89a5f654c1adcc5c6268c2b4147877bba824a/compiler/src/dotty/tools/dotc/core/tasty/TastyPrinter.scala#L63
it uses `Yellow` directly instead of `treeColor`. Fixing that

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +159,163 @@
  protected def nameColor(str: String): String = Magenta(str).show
  protected def treeColor(str: String): String = Yellow(str).show
  protected def lengthColor(str: String): String = Cyan(str).show
}
